description: Because we love security, we created a brand new system using 501-factor authentication. The problem is running at 501.p.tjctf.org. The QR codes containing the TOTP information for each factor, in order, is at images.tar.gz. The source code is at app.py.
hint: Look into how TOTPs (Timed One-Time Passwords) work. Make sure your time is correct, since it matters.
